subject: Project Delta - action needed by Friday
body: Hi, Can you review the attached spec and send feedback by Friday? Also confirm if you can attend the sync on Monday.

subject: Your weekly TechDaily newsletter
body: Top stories this week: AI accelerates, startups raise funding...

subject: You've Won! Claim your prize now
body: Click here to claim your prize. Limited time offer!

subject: Interview schedule - please confirm
body: We have scheduled your interview on Nov 25 at 10:00 AM. Please confirm availability.

subject: Invoice 2234 and next steps
body: Please find invoice attached. Can you confirm payment date and whether we should proceed with phase 2?

subject: Quick question about the API
body: Is the endpoint returning 500 for large payloads? We need to debug and patch.

subject: Invitation: Community Clean-Up
body: Join us this Saturday for a community clean-up. Please RSVP.

subject: Your order #8890 has shipped
body: Your package is on the way. Tracking: XYZ123

subject: Paper feedback - draft v2
body: Great progress. Please address points 1-3 and resubmit by Nov 22.

subject: Credit card upgrade offer
body: We invite you to upgrade. Low interest rate for new applicants.

subject: Lunch tomorrow?
body: Fancy lunch at 1? I can book a table.

subject: Urgent: Database migration window
body: We plan a migration Sunday at 02:00. Need approvals and backup verification. Please confirm and add any concerns.
